channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump held Americans’ Thanksgiving travel hostage to force through health care cuts, Democratic senator suggests
item.description: Sen. Tammy Duckworth wants to know why the FAA and Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy haven't shown the safety data behind their order to cut flights...

item.title: The OBBBA has a significant tax change for founders tucked away inside, lifting the cap to $75 million with many opportunities to turbo-charge business
item.description: The QSBS reforms in the OBBBA are more than just tax tweaks—they’re a strategic invitation to growth, raising capital and exiting.

item.title: Reports of the retail store’s demise have been greatly exaggerated

item.title: ‘Yes, it is an ambitious, crazy thing’: Scenes from the Kennedy Center’s Saudi-U.S. AI mind-meld, with Trump, MBS, Musk and Huang

item.title: Home Depot says a deep funk in the housing market is responsible for its sales slump: ‘Our customers are homeowners’
item.description: The U.S. housing market is currently experiencing historic stagnation.
